Rice Lake

Product Interface Design

An Interface For Everything

Rice Lake makes industrial scales. The big scales that weigh your luggage at the airport, your truck at the rest stop or the ingredients in food processing plants. The control systems for these scales, called indicators, are extremely powerful and configurable.

When Rice Lake began working on a new series of indicators, we were brought in to analyze the current product line, interview users to assess needs and ultimately design a bulletproof interface that could gracefully handle a diverse array of applications.

Configurable

We designed a wide array of components that can be used to lay out scale displays specifically tailored to each user's application. Need to track your chocolate chip cookie factory's hoppers? We've got an icon for that.
